headline: Northrop Grumman to Participate in Citi’s 2026 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., Feb. 11, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE: NOC) will participate in Citi’s 2026 Global Industrial Tech and Mobility Conference on Wednesday, February 18. Kathy Warden, chair, chief executive officer and president, will present beginning at 9:40 a.m. Eastern time. The presentation will be webcast live at http://investor.northropgrumman.com.
